statements: SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_components;
SELECT component_name, quantity, price FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM wind_turbine_components ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM wind_turbine_components;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT component_name, price FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT component_name, supplier_id FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE supplier_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT component_name, supplier_id, price FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY supplier_id;
SELECT component_name, quantity, price FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE quantity > 10 AND supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM WindTurbineComponents
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM WindTurbineComponents ORDER BY component_id DESC
SELECT component_name, unit_price FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT * FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE component_type = 'Blade'
SELECT component_name, quantity, unit_price FROM WindTurbineComponents ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT * FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE component_type = 'Blade' ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE unit_price > 1000 GROUP BY component_type ORDER BY component_name ASC
SELECT component_type, SUM(quantity*unit_price) AS total_cost FROM WindTurbineComponents GROUP BY component_type ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE component_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY component_id ASC
SELECT component_name, unit_price, quantity FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE quantity > 10 AND unit_price <= 500 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT * FROM WindTurbineComponents ORDER BY component_id ASC;
SELECT component_id, component_name, quantity FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT component_name, price FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT component_name, price FROM WindTurbineComponents WHERE component_id = 3;
SELECT component_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory JOIN WindTurbineComponents ON Inventory.component_id = WindTurbineComponents.component_id;

SELECT order_id, component_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM Orders JOIN WindTurbineComponents ON Orders.component_id = WindTurbineComponents.component_id WHERE quantity >= 20 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.quantity, Inventory.location FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.component_id = Inventory.component_id WHERE Orders.quantity > 5 AND Inventory.quantity > 0 ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_components;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'Germany';
SELECT component_name AS Component, component_type AS Type, manufacturer AS Manufacturer FROM wind_turbine_components ORDER BY component_name DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, suppliers.supplier_name, components.component_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id JOIN components ON orders.component_id = components.component_id ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC;
SELECT component_name, component_type, manufacturer FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT component_name, quantity, manufacturer FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE quantity > 10 AND manufacturer LIKE 'GE%';

SELECT o.order_id, s.supplier_name, c.component_name, o.quantity FROM orders o JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN wind_turbine_components c ON o.component_id = c.component_id WHERE o.status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_components;
SELECT component_id, component_name, component_quantity FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE component_quantity > 10;
SELECT component_name, manufacturer_id FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE component_type = 'Blade';
SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM wind_turbine_components WHERE component_type = 'Blade' ORDER BY component_quantity DESC;

SELECT c.component_name, m.manufacturer_name FROM wind_turbine_components c INNER JOIN manufacturers m ON c.manufacturer_id = m.manufacturer_id WHERE c.component_quantity > 100 AND m.manufacturer_location = 'Europe';

SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN wind_turbine_orders o ON c.customer_id = o.order_id WHERE order_quantity >= 10 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT i.inventory_id, i.quantity_on_hand, c.component_name FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN wind_turbine_components c ON i.component_id = c.component_id WHERE i.quantity_on_hand < 50 ORDER BY i.quantity_on_hand ASC;

SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM manufacturers m INNER JOIN wind_turbine_components c ON m.manufacturer_id = c.manufacturer_id INNER JOIN wind_turbine_orders o ON c.component_id = o.component_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name HAVING total_orders >= 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
